entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING, Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:45 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
